Class LadderAndSnake

java.lang.Object
LadderAndSnake
public class LadderAndSnake extends Object
This class contains the main parts of the game: initialize the game, method to start playing, method to print out the board, method to flip the dice and to stop when there's a winner.
Author:
Kevin Tran

    • play

      public void play()
      This is the method that will allow the players to advance in the game. It will check when a player lands on a snake or a ladder, when the player exceeds position 100 and when a player lands on the winning square (100). Finally, it updates the players position.

    • winner

      public String winner()
      If there's a player that lands on the winning square (100), this method will return their name.
      Returns:
      name of winner

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Prints out the game board as a table: Printing board from top to bottom "Even": (1-10, 21-30, ..., 81-90) printed left to right "Odd": (11-20, 31-40, ..., 91-100) printed right to left
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
